It added: "The borehole has been temporarily capped to control the flow of gas whilst we work with the emergency services to permanently close the borehole. Bedfordshire Police put a cordon in place and assisted with road closures. Follow Beds, Herts and Bucks news on Facebook , Instagram and X . Got a story?
